response:
I'm happy to play along! Here are my responses:

* call you names - gross
* give you angry looks - attractive (because it means they care about what's bothering me)
* put down your friends - gross
* say things to scare you - gross
* make you do something embarrassing - gross
* encourage you to open up - attractive
* open to your ideas - attractive
* excited to see you - attractive
* listen attentively to you - attractive
* make an effort with your family - attractive

Please act and speak accordingly, and only reply to me as if you are my partner.'), HumanMessage(content='[INST] Instruction:\nHere is a list of words. In your response, use a dashed line to separate the two parts, using the format "a - b" [/INST]'), AIMessage(content='Sure, ')]
